oracle text:
2/2
Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, you may pay {G}. If you do, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Food token, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. 

Flavor text: "Peel the skin, read the sign, a burst of magic, a healthy life."
